title: All Courses - Sophia Learning
snippet: With Sophia’s on-demand, self-paced format, you can complete your courses on your schedule, at your pace. Sophia courses are available anytime, anywhere, and most can be accessed from any device.

title: Sophia (wisdom) - Wikipedia
snippet: Sophia, or Sofia (Koine Greek: σοφία, sophía —"wisdom") is a central idea in Hellenistic philosophy and religion, Platonism, and Gnosticism.

title: Meaning, origin and history of the name Sophia
snippet: Sep 26, 2025 · Legends about her probably arose as a result of a medieval misunderstanding of the phrase Hagia Sophia "Holy Wisdom", which is the name of a large basilica in Constantinople.

title: Sophia - Baby Name Meaning, Origin, and Popularity
snippet: 4 days ago · Sophia Origin and Meaning The name Sophia is a girl's name of Greek origin meaning "wisdom". Sophia, which was the Number 1 girls' name in the US from 2011 to 2013, is among the top girl names in the Western World, with a sensuous sound and high-minded meaning.

title: Sophia: Name Meaning, Popularity and Info on BabyNames.com
snippet: 3 days ago · What is the meaning of the name Sophia? The name Sophia is primarily a female name of Greek origin that means Wisdom. Sophia is a name of Greek origin, derived from the word "sophos," meaning "wisdom." In ancient Greece, Sophia was the personification of wisdom and was often depicted as a goddess.
